Translations.Text: us ka hum nasheen (shaytaan) kahega, aye hamaare rab! main ne ise gumraah nahi kiya tha, balke ye khud hee door daraaz ki gumraahi mein tha
haq ta’ala farmayega, bas mere saamne jhagde ki baath math karo, main to pehle hee tumhaari taraf wayeedh (waada azaab) bhej chuka tha
mere haan baath badalti nahi aur na main apne bandho par zara bhi zulm karne wala hoon
jis din hum dozakh se pochenge kya tu bhar chuki? wo jawaab degi kya kuch aur zyaada bhi hai
aur jannath parhezgaaro ke liye bilkul qareeb kardi jayegi, zara bhi door na hogi
ye hai jis ka tum se waada kiya jaata tha, har us shaqs ke liye jo ruju karne waala aur pa-bandhi karne waala ho
jo rahmaan ka ghaybaana khauf rakhta ho, aur tawajje waala dil laaya ho
tum is jannath mein salaamti ke saath daakhil ho jaao, ye hamesha rehne ka din hai
ye wahaa jo chaahe unhe milega (balke) hamaare paas aur bhi zyaada hai
aur un se pehle bhi hum bahuth si ummato ko halaak kar chuke hai, jo un se taaqath mein bahuth zyaada thi, wo shahro mein dhoondte hee reh gaye, ke koyi bhaagne ka thikaana hai
is mein har saahebe dil ke liye ibrath hai aur us ke liye jo dil se mutawajjeh ho kar kaan lagaaye aur wo haazir ho
yaqinan hum ne asmaano aur zameen aur jo kuch us ke darmiyaan hai, sab ko (sirf) che din mein payda kar diya aur hamein thakaan ne chua tak nahi
pas ye jo kuch kehte hai, aap us par sabr kare aur apne rab ki tasbih tareef ke saath bayaan kare, suraj nikalne se pehle bhi aur suraj ghuroob hone se pehle bhi
aur raath ke kisi waqth bhi tasbih kare aur namaaz ke baadh bhi
aur sun rakhe ke jis din ek pukaarne waala qareeb hee ki jageh se pukaarega
jis roz us tandh wa tez cheeq ko yaqeen ke saath sun lenge, ye din hoga nikalne ka
hum hee jilaate hai aur hum hee maarte hai aur hamaari hee taraf laut phir kar ana hai
jis din zameen phat jayegi aur ye daudte hoye (nikal padenge), ye jama kar lena hum par bahuth hee asaan hai
ye jo kuch keh rahe hai, hum ba-qoobi jaante hai aur aap un par jabar karne waale nahi, to aap Qur’aan ke zariye unhe samjhaate rahe, jo mere wayeedh (daraawe ke waado) se darte hai
qasam hai bhikerne waaliyo ki uda kar
phir uthaane waaliya bojh ko
phir chalne waaliya narmi se
phir kaam ko taqseem karne waaliya
yaqeen maano ke tum se jo waade kiye jaate hai (sab) sacche hai
aur beshak insaaf hone waala hai
qasam hai raaho waale asmaan ki
yaqinan tum muqtalif baath mein pade hoye ho
us se wahi baaz rakha jaata hai jo pher diya gaya ho
be’sanadh batein karne waale ghaarath kar diye gaye
jo ghaflath mein hai aur bhole hoye hai
pochte hai ke yaume jaza kab hoga
haan ye wo din hai ke ye aag par tapaaye jayenge
apni fitna pardaazi ka maza chako, yahi hai jis ki tum jaldi macha rahe thein
beshak taqwa waale log bahishto aur chashmo mein honge
un ke rab ne jo kuch unhe ata farmaya hai, ose le rahe honge, wo to us se pehle hee neko kaar thein
wo raath ko bahuth kam soya karte thein
aur waqte sahar esteghfaar kiya karte thein
aur un ke maal mein maangne waalo ka aur sawaal se bachne waalo ka haq tha
aur yaqeen waalo ke liye to zameen mein bahuth si nishaaniya hai
aur khud tumhaari zaath mein bhi, to kya tum dekhte nahi ho
aur tumhaari rozi aur jo tum se waada kiya jaata hai, sab asmaan mein hai
asmaan wa zameen ke parvardigaar ki qasam! ke ye bilkul bar haq hai, aisa hee jaise ke tum batein karte ho
kya tujhe Ibraheem(alaihissalaam) ke mauzzaz mehmaano ki qabar bhi pahonchi hai
wo jab un ke haan aaye to salaam kiya, Ibraheem(alaihissalaam) ne jawaabe salaam diya (aur kaha ye to) ajnabi log hai
phir (chup chaap jaldi jaldi) apne ghar waalo ki taraf gaye aur ek farba bachde (ka goshth) laaye
aur ose un ke paas rakha aur kaha aap khaate kyo nahi
phir to dil hee dil mein un se khauf zada ho gaye, unhone kaha aap khauf na ki jiye aur unhone us (hazrath Ibraheem(alaihissalaam) ko ek ilm waale ladke ki bashaarath di
pas un ki biwi aage badi aur hayrath mein aa kar apne mu par haath maar kar kaha ke main to budhiya hoon aur saath hee baanjh
unhone kaha haan tere parvardigaar ne isi tarah farmaaya hai, beshak wo hakeem aur aleem hai
